Articles.Content:
ATTENTION ALL WHO WISH FOR A HARD CHALENGE.

we are a race on minimus and we need fuel to thaw out our homes and get back into space. we are much like you, just shorter, more dwarven if u wish.

o.k. enough backstory. in short i need people to try and thaw out minimus. (use moar tnt) you cant crash and must have at least 1 full tank of fuel landed on minimus. the dwarves are cold. thaw them out with the heat of a srb. mods allowed.

i recomend making a low wight, low thrust srb or a high wight low thrust srb.
Um. This feels like a spam thread.
not a spam thread, just a dumb laptop

> 
> not a spam thread, just a dumb laptop

The laptop can\'t be dumb. Although you are the one in control of it. Please lock this thread as it servers absolutely no purpose.
